rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0001
rows.name: This crevasse is incredible!

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0002
rows.name:
Look how high up the
Genbu Snowfield is!

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0003
rows.name:
Hey...
How did this crevasse form?

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0004
rows.name: How should I answer?

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0005
rows.name:
Gramps told me that someone
created it with a single punch.

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0006
rows.name:
It happened when
the Divine Beast moved.

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0007
rows.name: How should I answer?

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0008
rows.name:
I've heard tales about someone
making it with a single punch.

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0009
rows.name:
Perhaps it happened when
the Divine Beast moved?

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0010
rows.name: How should I respond?

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0011
rows.name:
I've heard tales that someone
split it open with their fist...

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0012
rows.name:
I imagine it formed when
the Divine Beast moved.

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0013
rows.name: What should I say?

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0014
rows.name:
They say someone punched
the ground to make it!

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0015
rows.name:
I reckon it happened when
the Divine Beast moved.

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0101
rows.name: Seriously...?

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0102
rows.name:
My Icicle Judgment could
never cause damage like this.

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0103
rows.name:
So my power is still too weak...
There are stronger people out there...

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0105
rows.name: What's with that look on your face?

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0106
rows.name: Don't tell me it was a joke!?

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0107
rows.name:
Seriously, I'm a completely
straightforward Blade, so don't
mess with me like that.

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0108
rows.name:
But seriously,
if I could develop enough power
to create a rift like this...

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0201
rows.name:
We'd be right in the middle of
Genbu right about now.

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0202
rows.name:
The energy generated when
a Divine Beast moves must be enormous,
don't you think?

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0203
rows.name:
After all, they have
such enormous bodies.

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0204
rows.name:
If I could obtain power on par with
a moving Divine Beast...

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0301
rows.name:
I could definitely get a blazing fist
that could defeat any evil!

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0302
rows.name: Don't you think so too?

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0303
rows.name: As passionate as ever, aren't you Glen?

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0304
rows.name: You're as intense as ever, Glen.

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0305
rows.name: Glen still has a passionate heart.

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0306
rows.name: Glen's passionate heart hasn't changed.

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0307
rows.name:
Yeah, you bet!
My heart and my fists remain constant.

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0308
rows.name:
Saving people means
saving them from their own weaknesses,
right?

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0309
rows.name:
To do that,
I can't afford to waver in my resolve.

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0310
rows.name:
No, my heart and my fists forge ever
onwards, burning with justice!

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0311
rows.name:
But, Glen, your fists are made of ice,
aren't they?

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0312
rows.name:
But your fists are actually ice,
aren't they?

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0313
rows.name:
I just realized something...
Isn't your power ice-based
rather than fire?

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0314
rows.name:
You're all fired up,
but take a look at your fists,
they're clearly made of ice.

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0315
rows.name: Huh?

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0316
rows.name: ...Wait, hold on a second.

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0317
rows.name:
You're right about that...
Why are they made of ice?

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0318
rows.name:
It makes no sense!
My power should
definitely be fire-based!

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0319
rows.name:
I'm always burning with passion!?
What the heck is going on here?

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0320
rows.name: I mean, don't ask me...

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0321
rows.name:
I mean, that's not something
I can answer...

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0322
rows.name:
I mean, I don't really have
an answer for that...

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0323
rows.name: How should I know...

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0324
rows.name:
...Alright, there's only
one solution to this!

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0325
rows.name: Listen up, Driver.

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0326
rows.name:
My fists aren't made of ice,
they're blue flames!

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0327
rows.name:
See? They even look kind of flame-like!
Problem solved!

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0328
rows.name:
Got that?
Blue flames, okay? Are we clear?

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0329
rows.name: Bit of a stretch, don't you think?

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0330
rows.name: That seems like a stretch to me.

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0331
rows.name:
Comparing you to Kagutsuchi, I think
that's something of a stretch...

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0332
rows.name:
Come on, that's way too much
of a stretch, ain't it?

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0333
rows.name:
I don't care! From a distance, they
look like flames, okay?!

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0334
rows.name:
Great!
From now on, I am Glen
of the Blue Flame!
